snippet: Businesses have long sought information on how prosecutors enforce the federal anticorruption law that bans American businesses from bribing officials overseas.
abstract: Justice Department and Securities and Exchange Commission release long-awaited guidance on how prosecutors interpret and enforce the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, whicht bans American businesses from bribing officials overseas.
lead_paragraph: Businesses have long sought information on how prosecutors enforce the federal anticorruption law that bans American businesses from bribing officials overseas.

headline.seo: Justice Dept. Issues Guidance on Foreign Bribes
headline.main: Justice Dept. Issues Guidance on Overseas Bribes
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Issues Guidance on Overseas Bribes
